content: unicorn dreams short-row technique | us terminology crochet pattern © bebablanket 2021 the pattern is available at ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/bebablanket etsy https //www etsy com/shop/bebablanketdesigns you can use the pattern to create any item you want and sell your finished item if you wish but you have no right to claim that this pattern is created by you nor may you sell the pattern or share the file of the written pattern and/or videos free you have no right to create a video tutorial for this pattern without my written permission general information easy fun different unusual and eye-catching pattern unicorn dreams will look gorgeous no matter how many colors you use you can use one two or several solid colors as well as self-striping yarn better shorter color changes or variegated yarn with longer color changes like stylecraft merry go round papatya batik hayfield spirit lion brand ferris wheel iceyarns baby batik or magic baby and similar if you do not feel confident with color changes use variegated or self-striping yarn experience level advanced beginner language and terminology english us technique short-row crochet the pattern includes  detailed descriptions  pictures of the final result  a short video tutorial to demonstrate technique used for this pattern https //youtu be/lgms7ytntsg stitches & abbreviations chain/chs chain/chains st/sts stitch/stitches r/rs row/row single_crochet single_crochet decline single_crochet decline single_crochet special stitch of this pattern* decline single_crochet - insert hook around post of last single_crochet 2rs below yo pull though post insert hook into top of next single_crochet 1 more r below yo pull through all 3 loops on hook *this is not a standard crochet term used widely but the term created to use for this pattern additional information ● the pattern is created using short row technique ● all stitches go into the next stitch of previous row unless the pattern says otherwise ● parentheses indicate additional information ● if you use several color i advice to hide the tails as you go colors colors used for the pattern sample deramores studio baby seashell color a deramores studio baby other colors but a blossom buttercup lagoon orchid peppermint yarn hook & approximate size unicorn dreams pattern sample was created using the following yarn yarn deramores studio baby yarn weight #3 light/dk fiber content 100 % acrylic hook size clover amour 4 mm sample size and shape rectangle 69 x 84 cm 27 2 x 33 1 in seashell 100 g 270 m / 295 yrds blossom 60 g 162 m / 177 yrds amount of yarn used for pattern buttercup 60 g 162 m / 177 yrds sample lagoon 45 g 122 m / 133 yrds orchid 70 g 189 m /207 yrds peppermint 80 g 216 m /236 yrds you can use any yarn & appropriate hook size that suits your project to be the project in its best i advice to use a soft yarn more pattern samples you can find on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/unicorn- dreams/people
